fields_of_interest: Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives: Drones, unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), remotely piloted aircraft systems (RPAS), civil aviation, European Union Aviation Safety Agency
organisation_name: Grupa Marcova Polska Electro sp. z o.o. sp. k. (GMP Defence)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Grupa Marcova Polska Defence sp. z o.o. sp. k. is a technology integrator of advanced protection systems (autonomous drones/UAVs, anti-drone systems, ground-based radars and access control systems), present in 10 countries of Central and Eastern Europe.
